title: Validate policy match behavior; when both policy R1 AND R2 matches R1: p1 = alert & continue
custom_steps:
1. Create Email Outbound policies as 
R1: p1 = alert & continue
2. Generate email traffic with dlp profile P1 matching content as email subject, body or attachment
3. Verify policy match behavior
4. Verify skopeIT events/alerts generated
custom_expected:
- Verify policy and DLP type generated Alert  shows policy match as R1
- Skopeit should show action as None in policy alert and action as Allow in DLP alerts [This is same as NSPolicy behavior]; If there are policies with non-terminal action (alert & continue) policies.
